title: Requirements Gathering for Advanced HCI Interface - Updated
description: Gather and document user requirements for the advanced Human-Computer Interface (HCI) interface focusing on interactivity, immersion, and responsiveness. Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to ensure a comprehensive understanding of user needs. Include wireframes, prototypes, use cases, and any necessary research findings in the documentation. Prioritize user experience and usability, considering accessibility standards.

title: Design Concept Development
description: Create design concepts for the advanced HCI interface that meet gathered requirements.

title: User Interface (UI) Design
description: Design detailed UI layouts and components for the advanced HCI interface based on approved concepts.

title: User Experience (UX) Design
description: Create user flows and interactions for the advanced HCI interface to ensure a seamless and engaging user experience.

title: Frontend Development (Layout & Components)
description: Develop frontend layouts and components based on approved UI designs.

title: Frontend Development (Interactivity & Responsiveness)
description: Implement interactivity and responsiveness in the advanced HCI interface.

title: Backend Integration
description: Integrate the advanced HCI interface with necessary backend services.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the database schema to support the advanced HCI interface.

title: Database Implementation
description: Implement the designed database schema and setup necessary data structures.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Test the advanced HCI interface for functionality, performance, usability, and security.

title: Deployment and Release of Advanced HCI Interface
description:
1. Deploy the advanced HCI interface to production environment.
2. Monitor and address any issues that arise during deployment.
3. Ensure proper versioning, rollback mechanisms, continuous monitoring for performance and security.
4. Implement containerization best practices using Docker or Kubernetes.
5. Establish a CI/CD pipeline using tools like Jenkins or GitLab CI.
6. Collaborate with QA team for testing, and resolve any arising issues.
7. Once deployed and tested, document the process in technical documentation for future reference.
8. Periodically update the documentation as necessary.

title: Documentation
description: Write technical documentation for the advanced HCI interface.
